body:
When spell had no legal targets on resolve (Nantuko Husk "sacrificed himself") it's put into hand instead of graveyard, according to rule 702.25a - "If the buyback cost was paid, put this spell into its owner‘s
hand instead of into that player‘s graveyard AS IT Resolves".
